objects.specification: A large, flat rectangular floor panel with a light gray matte finish, sized to comfortably accommodate a demo car and visitor circulation; the surface is smooth and non-reflective to provide a neutral exhibition base.
A tall white vertical wall with a flat, bright white finish, forming the front boundary of the booth; it is smooth and provides a clean backdrop for promotional graphics.
A tall white vertical wall with a flat, bright white finish, forming the rear boundary of the booth; it is smooth and provides a clean background.
A tall white vertical wall with flat, bright white finish, enclosing the left side of the booth and providing consistent boundary surfaces.
A tall white vertical wall with flat, bright white finish, enclosing the right side of the booth and providing consistent boundary surfaces.

A modern, aerodynamic sedan-style demo car finished in striking glossy red paint (bright red RGB 255,0,0), featuring detailed rims, tinted windows, realistic headlights, subtle branding accents, and a streamlined silhouette to serve as the focal exhibit.
A sleek, minimalistic rectangular reception desk with a high-gloss black finish, clean straight edges and a sturdy base; designed to welcome visitors and display informational materials.
A freestanding white matte-finish rectangular display stand with a slanted top for brochures and a built-in shelf for promotional items; clean edges and a sturdy base.
A freestanding white matte-finish rectangular display stand with a slanted top for brochures and a built-in shelf for promotional items; clean edges and a sturdy base.
A freestanding white matte-finish rectangular display stand with a slanted top for brochures and a built-in shelf for promotional items; clean edges and a sturdy base.
A tall, slender banner with a deep blue background (RGB 0,0,255) and a large car brand logo in contrasting white; mounted on a slim frame with a smooth matte banner surface.
A tall, slender banner with a metallic silver background (RGB 192,192,192) featuring bold brand text and subtle blue accent graphics; smooth, semi-reflective finish on a slim supporting frame.
A modern visitor chair with a dark gray padded fabric seat and backrest (RGB 64,64,64), slender metal legs, ergonomic curves, no armrests; arranged for comfortable consultations.
A modern visitor chair with a dark gray padded fabric seat and backrest (RGB 64,64,64), slender metal legs, ergonomic curves, no armrests; arranged for comfortable consultations.
A modern visitor chair with a dark gray padded fabric seat and backrest (RGB 64,64,64), slender metal legs, ergonomic curves, no armrests; arranged for comfortable consultations.
A modern visitor chair with a dark gray padded fabric seat and backrest (RGB 64,64,64), slender metal legs, ergonomic curves, no armrests; arranged for comfortable consultations.
A decorative potted plant with glossy green foliage and a simple terracotta-style pot, offering a natural accent to the booth corners.
A decorative potted plant with glossy green foliage and a simple terracotta-style pot, offering a natural accent to the booth corners.
A decorative potted plant with glossy green foliage and a simple terracotta-style pot, offering a natural accent to the booth corners.
A decorative potted plant with glossy green foliage and a simple terracotta-style pot, offering a natural accent to the booth corners.
